short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A better new tab experience with Captain America Tribute

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With this extension, you get different HD images of CAPTAIN AMERICA on each new tab page!

If you have any questions or feedback support can be reached at info@brandthunder.com

With our extension, you get:
1:  A high-res new tab experience 
2:  Simple, direct search from the new tab page via the tab search box
3:  Advertisements and buttons (links) for your favorite merchants right on the new tab page
4:  We are search and ad supported!  Thanks for your support...
